title: These Luxe Sunglasses Are the Ultimate Cool-Girl Upgrade
excerpt: Searching for a new pair of designer sunglasses? No matter the style or shape you prefer, you can shop all of our top picks for a safe and sunny season ahead.

html:
Daily Classic

Barton Perreira Samo 49MM Square Sunglasses

Looking for a new everyday pair to wear? Look no further than these chic and updated sunnies from Barton Perreira.

Colors: Gradient Grey Julep

Material: Acetate

On Trend

Stella McCartney Stella 57MM Pilot Sunglasses

The frame of the summer is the chunky aviator, and this pair is an excellent intro to the trend. It’s an updated and modern take on the beloved sunglass silhouette.

Colors: Dark Grey Black, Brown Transparent Mauve

Material: Acetate

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Modern Lens

Fendi Way 53MM Rectangular Sunglasses

A good rectangular pair is a must when it comes to sunglasses. These have hints of the ’90s yet still feel current, thanks to their boxy lens shape.

Colors: Black, Light Brown Pink, Dark Havana Grey

Material: Acetate

Geometric Girly

Miu Miu Metal Geometric Oval Sunglasses

A geometric lens shape sets these apart from the rest. They remain elevated while still having a touch of fun.

Colors: Pale Gold, Light Brown, Gold Grey

Material: Metal

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Summer Staple

Celine Triomphe Logo Oval Acetate Sunglasses

These Celine sunglasses are super popular, and for good reason. Their classic shape and style make them a staple you need in your collection.

Colors: Black/Gold, Black Smoke, Light Brown

Material: Acetate

So Chic

Prada Brown Rounded Rectangle Acetate Sunglasses

Prada makes some of the best designer sunglasses on the market, including this sleek and chic pair.

Colors: Honey Tortoise/Dark Brown

Material: Acetate

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Beautiful Burgundy

Gucci Burgundy GG Oval Sunglasses

Burgundy has quickly become a new neutral that you need in your wardrobe, and this pair of Gucci sunglasses might be one of my favorite ways to incorporate it.

Colors: Burgundy

Material: Acetate

Cat-Eye Cool

KHAITE x Oliver Peoples 1961C Acetate Cat-Eye Sunglasses

There’s something about a pair of cat-eye sunglasses that feels both feminine and glamorous. A bit of a departure from a standard shape, they still remain one of the most versatile pairs you can own.

Colors: Black, Grey, Brown

Material: Acetate

Boho Vibes

Chloé Acetate Cat-Eye Sunglasses

An oversized shape is one you can always rely on, ideal for your next vacation or your everyday errands. Chloé makes a pair perfect for an effortless finishing touch to your look; you’ll reach for them again and again.

Colors: Shiny Dark Havana

Material: Acetate

Classic Brand

Ray-Ban Unisex Icons Round Sunglasses

At this point, if you don’t have a pair of Ray-Ban’s, you’re truly missing out. While its Wayfarer style is perhaps what they’re most well-known for, I’m partial to the round frame of these.

Colors: Gold/Green Solid

Material: Metal

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Spring Hue

Loewe Slim LW40147I Sunglasses

I love a pretty shade for the spring and summer months, and the light pink as an accent is a nice departure from your typical neutrals.

Colors: Spkbrnmr, Sblu/Brn

Material: Acetate

Everyday Elegance

Saint Laurent Color Animation 53MM Rectangular Sunglasses

Timeless, versatile, and stylish are three things you should be looking for in a pair of designer shades you want to have forever. This rectangular pair checks all of those boxes and more. Trust me—you’ll find yourself reaching for them on the daily.

Colors: Havana Black, Ivory Black

Material: Acetate

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Popular Pattern

Off-White Catalina Arrow Rectangle Sunglasses

Tortoiseshell will always be synonymous with sunglasses, and this silhouette lets the pattern shine. The angular frame shape makes them a fun and modern choice for the summer and beyond.

Colors: Havana Green

Material: Acetate

Versatile Style

Morgenthal Frederics Joan Sunglasses

You can never go wrong with a classic pair of sunglasses like these. They’re the type of style you can wear all year long.

Colors: Tortoise, Blue 845, Green 319, Dark Tortoise/Tokyo Tortoise 853

Material: Acetate

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Traditional Twist

Cubitts Cartwright Sunglasses

With a subtle twist on a traditional sunglasses shape and three frame size options (and the added option for a custom fit in Cubitts stores) you’ll be able to select the pair that fits your face best.

Colors: 8 options

Material: Acetate

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
